alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Alachua, central Marion and west central Putnam Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Archer to Anthony to Lake Weir. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Fort McCoy, Citra, Lynne, Hawthorne, Archer, Sparr, The Village of Briar Meadow, Moss Bluff and Lake Weir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam
